h2.em: Pettus ISD closed for the remainder of our 2019-20 school year!

div.div: We will share more information as it becomes available. In the meantime, please continue doing your part to stay say safe!
All normal district operations will be closed through the remainder of the 2019-20 school year, per Governor Abbott

img.alt: School Board Meeting Monday April 20 Featured Photo

div.div: Pettus Elementary will have their next pick up / drop off of student packets on Monday, April 20th from 9:00 am - 2:00 pm at the elementary. Please do not get out of your vehicle. Someone will come to you and collect your child's completed work and bring the new packets to your car.
